hero.name: Nicolas Torres
hero.title: Full Stack Developer 🚀
hero.description: I'm a passionate Full Stack Developer, with experience building modern web applications that deliver a cool user experience. 💪✨

about.title: About me 😎
about.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer TypeScript-First 🚀💥
about.description: I create end-to-end web products with Node.js + Express on the server and Next.js 14 on the frontend, always prioritising TypeScript and a smooth user experience. 🔥💻

stack.title: Mi Stack 💻
stack.description: I use the following technologies to create my projects:

methodology.title: Methodology 🧠
methodology.description: Light agile practice: atomic commits, small PRs, CI/CD with GitHub Actions, live documentation in MD and fast ship → learn → improve cycles. 🔄⚡

workStyle.title: How I work 🤝
workStyle.description: Always with humour and respect; I bring useful ideas, communicate in ES/EN without friction and keep the team aligned. 😄🌟

projects.title: Key projects 🚀
projects.subtitle: Solutions that have generated real impact 💥
projects.spiritory: Premium e-commerce for spirits; full-stack maintenance and new functionalities 🥃✨
projects.quick10x: Real-time crypto screener with subscriptions and admin panel ₿📊
projects.spiritory_impact: Europe's largest whisky trading platform and soon the world! 🌍🥃
projects.quick10x_impact: Real-time crypto screener with subscriptions and admin panel 📈💎

personal.title: A bit more about me 🤠
personal.description: Outside of coding, I record videos for YouTube, launch SaaS side-projects and share dev tips on networks. Programming is my number one hobby. 📺🎮💻
